system.descriptor: Escaping bonds, squeezing through thin gaps, fitting into small areas not normally meant for the character.
system.uses: Use: Escape Bonds. Opposed Test vs opponent's Intelligence. Success Escapes, takes 1 minute, -10 seconds per DoS. Quality of bonds effects test. Use: Escape Grapple. Opposed Test vs Strength, success frees from grapple. Use: Squeeze Through. Skill Test to fit into or through small gap or space. Failiure means cannot pass or fit, 4+ DoF character is stuck. Difficulty dependent on size of space. Takes 1 minute, -10 seconds per DoS.
